WorkItem.Summary: The 'codeGenOptions' attribute is invalid - The value '*' is invalid according to its datatype

Comments.Message: Your assumption about the cause of the error is wrong, but that you get the exception I don't doubt. Would you please attach your .csd file to this work item using the "Attach File" field below, so that I may test it?
Okay, I see what's wrong. It's not your fault, it's a bug in the CSD. I'll fix it and issue a bug-fix release ASAP.
